JobFullDesc: Facebook is looking for a Research Engineer to work on the Facebook AI Lab (FAIR Labs) team in Robotics. The FAIR Robotics Research Engineering team supports fundamental research in robotics that advances the state of the art in AI. The team is responsible for building research frameworks and tools, prototyping new applications based on FAIR's research, as well as all aspects of conducting exploratory research in collaboration with FAIR's research scientists. FAIR Robotics  research includes learning physical, cognitive, linguistics, and social skills, with an emphasis on connecting robotics with advances in vision and natural language processing.Contribute to development of software tools that support AI-centered robotics research.Collaborate with research scientists to design and build robotics experiments.Build software and hardware infrastructure to support our exploratory research roadmap.Provide technical consultation to research scientists on state-of-the-art approaches to solving a wide range of problems in robotics.MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONSCurrently has, or is in the process of obtaining, a Masters degree in Robotics.Coding experience in C++, and Python or similar language.Must obtain work authorization in country of employment at the time of hire, and maintain ongoing work authorization during employment.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSCurrently has, or is in the process of obtaining, a Masters degree in Robotics.Coding experience in C++, and Python or similar language.Must obtain work authorization in country of employment at the time of hire, and maintain ongoing work authorization during employment.Facebook's mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together.
